scripts.firedev: concurrently -n "ts","emulator","next.js" -c "blue,yellow,white" "cd functions && npm run dev" "firebase emulators:start && echo 'Do not worry about the error above. The emulators were most likely all stopped.' && echo 'If you have a problem launching the emulator again, use the command it has given you to kill the process.' && echo 'Press Ctrl+C again to exit.'" "cross-env FIREBASE_AUTH_EMULATOR_HOST=localhost:9099 FIRESTORE_EMULATOR_HOST=localhost:8081 NEXT_PUBLIC_FIREDEV=true next dev"
scripts.vercelbuild: cross-env NEXT_PUBLIC_FIREDEV=false && rm -rf functions && next build
